dao.name: SEL_ALT_NAM
dao.statement: SELECT CUST_IDX.CUST_COD, CUST_IDX.ALT_NAM, CUST_IDX.FIRST_NAM, CUST_IDX.LAST_NAM, CUST_IDX.CUST_TYP, CUST_IDX.CUST_STA, CUST_IDX.SHOW_COD, SF_GET_CONTACT_BY_TABLE(cust_cod,from_table) contact_rmk, SF_GET_CONTACT_COD_BY_TABLE(cust_cod,from_table) contact_cod FROM CUST_IDX

dao.name: SEL_CUST_IDX_CUST_MN_PERS_DT_FOR_SELECT_OPTION
dao.statement: SELECT ALT_NAM, MOBILE_NOS, OFFICE_TEL, HOME_TEL, FAX_NOS, E_MAIL, SEX_TYP, BIRTH_DAT FROM CUST_IDX WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND FROM_TABLE = 'CUST_MN_PERS_DT'

dao.name: SEL_CUST_IDX_CUST_MN_PERS_DT
dao.statement: SELECT ALT_NAM, MOBILE_NOS, OFFICE_TEL, HOME_TEL, FAX_NOS, E_MAIL, SEX_TYP, BIRTH_DAT, cust_cod as per_cust_cod FROM CUST_IDX WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND FROM_TABLE = 'CUST_MN_PERS_DT'

dao.name: QRY_CUST_IDX_PER_IS_EXIST
dao.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cust_mn_per_count FROM CUST_IDX WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND CUST_COD = :cust_cod

dao.name: SEL_ALT_NAM_FOR_ORDER
dao.statement: select c.cust_cod, c.alt_nam, c.first_nam, c.last_nam, c.cust_typ, c.cust_sta, c.show_cod, c.id_cod, c.birth_dat, c.comp_nam, nvl(v.visit_nos,0) visit_nos, (trim(c.cust_cod) ||':'|| c.alt_nam) as guest_display from cust_idx c left join ghist_visit_dt v on c.athena_id = v.athena_id and v.hotel_cod = ? and c.cust_cod = v.gcust_cod where c.cust_typ in ('H', 'M', 'Q') and c.cust_sta in ('N', 'B', 'V') and c.athena_id = :athena_id order by c.alt_nam
